CreditMemoLine.name: CreditMemoLine
CreditMemoLine.description: Represents product, service, adjustment, or tax line items that were included in a credit memo.

AdjustmentAmount.description: Amount of this credit memo line item if its type is Adjustment.

AdjustmentAmountWithTax.description: Sum of the adjustment amount and the adjustment tax amount.

AdjustmentTaxAmount.description: Amount of the tax related to the adjustment amount.

BillingAddressId.description: ID of the billing address related to this credit memo line.

ChargeAmount.description: Amount of this credit memo line item if its type is Charge.

ChargeAmountWithTax.description: Sum of the adjustment amount and the adjustment tax amount.

ChargeTaxAmount.description: Amount of the tax related to the charge amount.

CreditMemoId.description: ID of the parent credit memo.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code associated with the credit memo line.

Description.description: Description of the credit memo line.

EndDate.description: For credit memos made from a time-based service, the end date of the line item being credited.

LineAmount.description: Amount of the credit memo line.

Name.description: Name of the credit memo line.

Product2Id.description: The product or service being credited in the credit memo line.

ReferenceEntityItemId.description: The order product or invoice line corresponding to this credit memo line.

ReferenceEntityItemType.description: The type of transaction that generated the credit memo line.

ReferenceEntityItemTypeCode.description: The type of object that generated the credit memo line.

RelatedLineId.description: The credit memo line related to this line item.

ShippingAddressId.description: The ID of the shipping address.

StartDate.description: For credit memo lines generated from a time-based service, the first date of the billing for the service.

Status.description: State of the credit memo line. Inherited from the credit memo.

TaxAmount.description: Total tax for the credit memo.

TaxCode.description: The code used to calculate the tax rate for the invoice line.

TaxDocumentNumber.description: The document number that tracks taxes calculated for this credit memo line.

TaxEffectiveDate.description: The date used to calculate the credit memo lineâ€™s TaxAmount.

TaxRate.description: Percentage value used for calculating tax.

TotalAmount.description: The total amount of the credit memo line before any applicable tax.

TotalAmountWithTax.description: Total amount of tax for this credit memo line, with tax included. Sum of TotalAmount and TaxAmount.

TaxStatus.description: Tracks whether the taxes were calculated for this credit memo line.

TaxTransactionNumber.description: Tracks the transaction number of the tax calculated for this credit memo line. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later. This field is available when Subscription Management is enabled.

TaxTreatmentId.description: The ID of the tax treatment for the credit memo line.

Type.description: The type of transaction for the invoice line.
